junie-b-jones.name: Junie B Jones
junie-b-jones.details:
Rolling Meadows High School Theater
Director: Stephanie Svarz
Lighting Designer: Michael Bauer
junie-b-jones.description: First show drawn fully in vectorworks. Used effectively a rep plot consisting of two conventional side washes (warm and cool) and front wash, LED cyc and top wash. Added specials and gobos.
junie-b-jones.photoCredits: Photos by Sean Radcliff and Michael Bauer

legally-blonde.details:
High School Dist 214 Summer Musical 2025
Wheeling High School Theater
Director: Jeremy Morton
Lighting Designer: Michael Bauer
